Tristan Petty has been a Zephyr Bulldog since his sophomore year. Tristan has earned the title of Valedictorian with the highest GPA in the senior class!

One of Tristan's favorite memories at Zephyr was going to the state robotics tournament.

He plans to attend Howard Payne University to play baseball and major in Biomedical Science. He wants to play baseball for as long as he can and while pursuing a career as an orthopedic surgeon.

While at Zephyr, Tristan has been involved in football, cross country, basketball, track, robotics, golf, UIL, and NHS.

To parents, family, and school staff, Tristan says, "Thank you for shaping me into the person I am now."

Zephyr Senior Spotlight

Trinity Thomas has been a Zephyr Bulldog since the 4th grade. Special congratulations to Trinity for being the Zephyr Salutatorian for the class of 2020.

She plans to attend the University of Arkansas to pursue a degree in Communication Sciences and Disorders. One day she hopes to become a speech language pathologist and work in a hospital.

While a student at Zephyr, Trinity has been involved in cheer, track, volleyball, basketball, UIL, One Act Play, FCA and NHS.

Though she will miss getting to be around her friends everyday, Trinity is looking forward to traveling to new places and meeting new people.

To future graduates, Trinity offers the following advice, "Don’t wish the time away, instead wish for more time. Wish for more time with your friends. Wish for more time with teachers who will push you to do your best. Wish for more time with your family who loves you. Wish for more time because it goes by fast."

She also expresses gratitude to her family, school faculty, and friends for their continuous support.

La Transferencia Electrónica de Beneficios por Pandemia (P-EBT, por sus siglas en inglés) es un beneficio de alimentos único para las familias que perdieron el acceso a comidas gratuitas o a precio reducido debido al cierre de las escuelas. A fin de mayo, las escuelas les enviarán instrucciones para realizar una solicitud a las familias elegibles para la P-EBT. La solicitud de la P-EBT estará disponible la primera semana de junio.

Los beneficios de alimentos de la P-EBT son para los niños que recibieron beneficios de alimentos del Programa Asistencial de Nutrición Suplementaria (SNAP, por sus siglas en inglés) para marzo de 2020 y para los niños que estén certificados para recibir comidas gratuitas o a precio reducido en Texas durante el año escolar 2019-20. Para obtener más información, visite: hhs.texas.gov/PEBT

"Two months after meeting my "soulmate," we married and have spent 49 wonderful years together! Judy and I have a son 45 and a daughter 42.

I served 38 years in the USAF. During the 1968 TET offensive, I was a forward air controller and received the Purple Heart, a bronze star, and a field commission. Sent to OTS at the Air Force Academy, I retired as a colonel in 2005 and moved to Evant.

We have a ranch where we raise Brangus cows and exotics such as Blackbuck antelope, Axis deer, Whitetail, Sable antelope, etc.

I obtained my teaching certification in 2011 and started my second career. I love teaching, hunting, fishing, wildlife viewing, and did I mention teaching???"
